Articles.Content: So i had been waiting for about 45 minutes to get a intercept with Duna because i was using a Ion engine, i finally get it, i warp and then i come to my ship strewn around space
that space kraken was slain. this is the space Cthulhu at work, he destroy's ship parts when using time warp.
stop time acceleration gradually like go though each of the stages one at a time.

that space kraken was slain. this is the space Cthulhu at work, he destroy's ship parts when using time warp.

wow really?

but that was funny.

what about the Space Krakens older Brother?
Jumping from 100000x time warp to 1x time wakes Space Cthulu, go from 100k to 10k and then to 1x and he will remain a-slumber.
The space Cthulu was having a go at my ship too, though he isn't as strong as his older brother, the Kraken, and I wasn't even in warp!
I haven't experienced it (yet), but that's probably because I use < and > to control timewarp (I spam < to drop to 1x)
unless the dead carcass on Bop is really a hoax, and the kraken lives on...
